name: MG10 COMBO
description: MG10 is a versatile mixer suitable for a wide range of users and applications. Input channels: 10 Line Inputs (4 mono, 3 stereo), 4 Mic Inputs with 48V phantom power and HPH per channel. Output channels: 2 ST, 1 MONITOR, 1 AUX send, 1 PHONES.

name: MG15G COMBO
description: 15-watts offers enough power for practice sessions. Custom 8" speaker provides classic British tone. Clean and Overdrive channels give you different sonic textures. 3-band EQ provides broad sound shaping.

name: MG15GFX COMBO
description: The Marshall MG15GFX 15W 1x8" Guitar Combo Amp offers guitarists an impressive range of tones and effects in a portable package. Four channels—clean, crunch, overdrive 1 and overdrive 2—provide a variety of tones from pristine cleans to heavy distortion.

name: MG15GR COMBO
description: The Marshall MG15GR 15W 1x8" Guitar Combo Amp offers guitarists an impressive range of tones and effects in a portable package. Four channels—clean, crunch, overdrive 1 and overdrive 2—provide a variety of tones from pristine cleans to heavy distortion.

name: MG30GFX COMBO
description: The Marshall MG30GFX is a 30W amp that captures the iconic Marshall sound. Featuring clean, crunch, OD1, and OD2 channels with customizable tones, it offers versatility for various playing styles. The 10” speaker delivers a powerful sound suitable for rehearsals and stage performances.

name: MG500FX COMBO
description: The MG50GFX is loaded with pure Marshall tone. You get your choice of Clean, Crunch, OD1, and OD2 channels that you can shape with a 3-band EQ. You also get integrated reverb, delay, and digital effects. Best of all, each channel's settings are storable and recallable.

name: STUDIO JTM HEAD
description: From its legendary warm and smooth tone to blending the voices for a combination of crunch and clean, the Studio JTM brings the outstanding sound that Marshall is so well known for. The smaller scale of the Studio JTM gives players the power of the authentic Marshall tone, in a more compact design.

name: STUDIO CLASSIC HEAD
description: The Studio Classic is loaded with all the player-friendly features you need, including a master volume, 3-band EQ with Presence control, preamp volume, effects loop, and DI output. You also get a power reduction circuit for attaining cranked-up tones without violating a noise ordinance.

name: JCM 800 LEAD SERIES COMBO
description: The Studio Classic is loaded with all the player-friendly features you need, including a master volume, 3-band EQ with Presence control, preamp volume, effects loop, and DI output. You also get a power reduction circuit for attaining cranked-up tones without violating a noise ordinance.

name: JCM800 2203 VINTAGE REISSUE HEAD
description: The Marshall JCM800 2203 Guitar Tube Amplifier Head is a one channel, all valve amplifier with no reverb or built-in effects. The Marshall JCM800 2203 Amplifier Head features an easy to use interface and a Series Effects Loop with a true bypass switch, this takes the loop completely out of the circuit.
